thread.section_title: Rome Life Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location
thread.title_full: Good location - Review of Rome Life Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Mary D
title: Good location
text: Good central hotel easy walk to most attractions wam welcome on reception happy to answer any questions you may have about directions transport etc .comfortable modern rooms with free mini bar on first night tea and coffee making facilities in the room replenished each day. excellent choice for breakfast everything we needed for a short break .
